primary.name: ANDI

key_features: Natural Language Query Engine - Ask questions in plain English and get actionable insights
LinkDNA™ Technology - Automatically connects related data across enterprise sources
Insight Labeling - AI-powered categorization and prioritization of business insights
Multi-Dataset Analysis - Analyze data across multiple sources simultaneously without ETL
Confidence-Based NLP - Every result comes with transparency and confidence scoring
Strategic Guidance Engine - Recommends next best actions, not just insights
Execution Workflows - Triggers automations and actions based on insights
